feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.49
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Significantly improved Subscription UI/UX v2 + v3
  • Fixes for Livewire data components
  • Purchase order inventory cost => product cost
  • v5.10.49 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10256

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.48...v5.10.49

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.50
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for translation resources
  • v5.10.50 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10258
  • Fix #10241 (wrong item net prices in XInvoices) by @felixfischer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10257

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.49...v5.10.50

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.51
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Significant improvements for handling Nordigen failures where ratelimiting exceptions resulted in requisition refreshes incorrectly.
  • Vendor Portal fixes (Profile edits)
  • v5.10.51 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10259
  • Updated translations by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10260

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.50...v5.10.51

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.52
entry.content:

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.51...v5.10.52

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.53
entry.content:
